addr:city.description: Identifies in term of cites the position of the hospital

addr:housenumber.description: Identifies the hosenumber of the hospital

addr:postcode.description: Identifies the postcode of the cites where the hospital is located

addr:street.description: Identifies the street name where the hospital is located

GeoCoordinates.description: Coordinates of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard

id.description: name that identifies a unique object
